blocks.content: Define the refinement relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-ref(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cref, copab(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s1)), cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}

blocks.origin:
axiom df-locfin(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(clocfin, cmpt(s0, ctop, cab(s1, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(cv(s1))), wral(s2, cuni(cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wcel(crab(s4, cv(s1), wne(cin(cv(s4), cv(s3)), emptycls)), cfn))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
}

blocks.name: refrel
blocks.content: Refinement is a relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: isref
blocks.content: The property of being a refinement of a cover. Dr. Nyikos once commented in class that the term "refinement" is actually misleading and that people are inclined to confuse it with the notion defined in ~ isfne . On the other hand, the two concepts do seem to have a dual relationship. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isref(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe)))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cref, c2)
  refrel()
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  adantrr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c2), universe))
  eqeltrd(cuni(c2), universe, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  3eqtr3g(cuni(c2), cuni(c0), c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  brabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, universe, cref, wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs1), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  eqeq2d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1)), c4, wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs1)), c4, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs1), c0)
  raleq(s0, cv(hs1), c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c4, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c3, cuni(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c2)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  rexeq(s1, cv(hs0), c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-ref(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isref(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ c1 â†’(c0[Ref]c2 â†”(c3 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1)))))
  âŠ£ c4 = â‹ƒ c0
  âŠ£ c3 = â‹ƒ c2
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  pm5.21nd(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0[Ref]c2, (c3 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1))), (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  anim2i(c0 âˆˆ c1, c0[Ref]c2, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  brrelex2i(c0, cref, c2)
  refrel()
  jca((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§(c3 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1)))), c0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  simpl(c0 âˆˆ c1, (c3 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1))))
  adantrr(c0 âˆˆ c1, c3 = c4, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1)), c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  sylibr((c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c3 = c4), c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, â‹ƒ c2 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  eqeltrd(â‹ƒ c2, universe, â‹ƒ c0, (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c3 = c4))
  3eqtr3g(â‹ƒ c2, â‹ƒ c0, c3, c4, (c0 âˆˆ c1 âˆ§ c3 = c4))
  simpr(c0 âˆˆ c1, c3 = c4)
  adantr(c0 âˆˆ c1, c3 = c4, â‹ƒ c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  brabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, universe, cref, (c3 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1))), (â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ hs1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ hs1, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1))), (â‹ƒ hs0 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1))))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c0, â‹ƒ hs0 = â‹ƒ hs1, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ hs1, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1)), â‹ƒ hs0 = c4, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1)))
  eqeq2d(â‹ƒ hs0, â‹ƒ hs1, c4, hs1 = c0)
  syl6eqr(â‹ƒ hs1, c4, â‹ƒ c0, hs1 = c0)
  unieq(hs1, c0)
  raleq(s0, hs1, c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, â‹ƒ hs0 = c4, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1)), c3 = c4, âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1)))
  eqeq1d(â‹ƒ hs0, c4, c3, hs0 = c2)
  syl6eqr(â‹ƒ hs0, c3, â‹ƒ c2, hs0 = c2)
  unieq(hs0, c2)
  ralbidv(s0, c0, hs0 = c2, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ hs0, s0 âŠ† s1), âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1))
  rexeq(s1, hs0, c2, s0 âŠ† s1)
  df-ref(hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w((c3 = c4 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s1 âˆˆ c2, s0 âŠ† s1))))

blocks.name: refbas
blocks.content: A refinement covers the same set. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm refbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))
} = {
  mpancom(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simprbda(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cref, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm refbas(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  âŠ¢ (c0[Ref]c1 â†’ c2 = c3)
  âŠ£ c3 = â‹ƒ c0
  âŠ£ c2 = â‹ƒ c1
} = {
  mpancom(c0[Ref]c1, c2 = c3, c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simprbda(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0[Ref]c1, c2 = c3, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(hs1 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âŠ† hs1)))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, universe, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: refssex
blocks.content: Every set in a refinement has a superset in the original cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm refssex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(c2, c0)), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  syl(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wi(wcel(c2, c0), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0)))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  mpancom(wbr(c0, cref, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simplbda(wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cref, c1), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  isref(hs0, s0, c0, universe, c1, cuni(c1), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  rspccv(hs0, c0, c2, wrex(s0, c1, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(c2, cv(s0)))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c1, wss(c2, cv(s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm refssex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ ((c0[Ref]c1 âˆ§ c2 âˆˆ c0)â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âŠ† s0))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  imp(c0[Ref]c1, c2 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âŠ† s0))
  syl(c0[Ref]c1, (c2 âˆˆ c0 â†’ âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âŠ† s0)), âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âŠ† s0)))
  mpancom(c0[Ref]c1, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âŠ† s0)), c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  brrelex1i(c0, cref, c1)
  refrel()
  simplbda(c0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ, c0[Ref]c1, âˆ€(hs0 âˆˆ c0, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âŠ† s0)), â‹ƒ c1 = â‹ƒ c0)
  isref(hs0, s0, c0, universe, c1, â‹ƒ c1, â‹ƒ c0)
  eqid(â‹ƒ c0)
  eqid(â‹ƒ c1)
  rspccv(hs0, c0, c2, âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, hs0 âŠ† s0), âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âŠ† s0))
  rexbidv(s0, c1, hs0 = c2, hs0 âŠ† s0, c2 âŠ† s0)
  sseq1(hs0, c2, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(âˆƒ(s0 âˆˆ c1, c2 âŠ† s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ssref
blocks.content: A subcover is a refinement of the original cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssref(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, cref, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c2))
} = {
  mpbir2and(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wbr(c0, cref, c2), wceq(c4, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4), wceq(c4, c3))
  biimpi(wceq(c3, c4), wceq(c4, c3))
  eqcom(c3, c4)
  ralrimiva(hs0, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))
  sylancl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  3ad2antl2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  ssel2(c0, c2, cv(hs0))
  ssid(cv(hs0))
  rspcev(hs1, cv(hs0), c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  sseq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4), wb(wbr(c0, cref, c2), wa(wceq(c4, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))
  isref(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wceq(c3, c4)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))

blocks.name: finptfin
blocks.content: A finite cover is a point-finite cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm finptfin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cptfin))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c0, cptfin), wral(hs0, cuni(c0), wcel(crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfn)))
  ralrimivw(hs0, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(crab(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cfn))
  rabfi(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

  eqid(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfn))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(c0))
}

blocks.name: ptfinfin
blocks.content: A point covered by a point-finite cover is only covered by finitely many elements. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm ptfinfin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cptfin), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  imp(wcel(c0, cptfin), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  syl(wcel(c0, cptfin), wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn)))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cptfin), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn)))
  isptfin(hs0, s0, c0, cptfin, c2)
  rspccv(hs0, c2, c1, wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn), wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  eleq1d(crab(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), cfn, crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  rabbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cv(s0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(crab(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cv(s0))), cfn))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: finlocfin
blocks.content: A finite cover of a topological space is a locally finite cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm finlocfin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))

blocks.name: locfinnei
blocks.content: A point covered by a locally finite cover has a neighborhood which intersects only finitely many elements of the cover. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.)

blocks.name: locfincmp
blocks.content: For a compact space, the locally finite covers are precisely the finite covers. Sadly, this property does not properly characterize all compact spaces. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: unisngl
blocks.content: Taking the union of the set of singletons recovers the initial set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm unisngl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(c0, cuni(c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cuni(c1)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, cuni(c1)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqtr2i(c0, cuni(c1), cuni(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))))
  unieqi(c1, cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))
  eqriv(hs0, cuni(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))), c0)
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wrex(s1, c0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  rexbii(s1, c0, wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  3bitri(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  impbii(wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))
  exlimiv(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))))
  eleqtrd(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1)), cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))))), wceq(csn(cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1))))
  eqid(csn(cv(s1)))
  spcev(s0, csn(cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(csn(cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  snex(cv(s1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(csn(cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1))))
  eleq2(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)), cv(hs0))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), csn(cv(s1)), csn(cv(s1)))
  velsn(hs0, cv(s1))

blocks.name: locfindis
blocks.content: The locally finite covers of a discrete space are precisely the point-finite covers. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 22-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: comppfsc
blocks.content: A space where every open cover has a point-finite subcover is compact. This is significant in part because it shows half of the proposition that if only half the generalization in the definition of metacompactness (and consequently paracompactness) is performed, one does not obtain any more spaces. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 21-Jan-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
